channel.title: OOPS News
channel.description: All the latest news about oopsa-daisy PHP programming.

item.title: Stumped for something to say
item.description: Well, so much for a brilliant start. My mind has gone a blank. Must be all that OOP nonsense I've been filling my head with...

item.title: The blog starts here!
item.description: The world has been waiting with bated breath, but the wait is over... It's time to dazzle the blogosphere with my dazzling wit. Stay tuned.
